Translations.Text: “Ndikulumbilira mzinda uwu (wa Makka)
“Ndipo iwe udzatsikira mu mzindawu mwa ufulu (ndi kuuonjezera ulemelero)
“Ndiponso ndikulumbilira chobereka ndi choberekedwa, (kudzera mwa iwo mtundu wa anthu udasungidwa)
“Ndithudi tamulenga munthu mmavuto (kuyambira chiyambi chake mpaka malekezero a moyo wake)
“Kodi (munthu wolengedwa ndi mavutoyu) akuganiza kuti palibe amene angamuthe
“Akunena (monyadira kuti): “Ndaononga chuma chambiri (chifukwa choletsa Chisilamu kufala).”
“Kodi akuganiza kuti palibe akumuona
“Kodi sitidampangire maso awiri (amene akuyang’anira)
“Ndilirime ndi milomo iwiri (zimene akulankhulira)
“Ndipo tamlongosolera njira ziwiri: (yabwino ndi yoipa, ndipo tampatsa mphamvu yosankhira njira imene akufuna)
“Kodi walikwera phiri lovutalo (lomwe lingakamfikitse ku Jannah)
“Nanga nchiyani chakudziwitsa za kukwera phiri lovutalo
“(Kutero ndiko) kupereka ufulu kwa kapolo
“Kapena kuwadyetsa (osowa) pa tsiku la njala
“Amasiye achibale
“Kapena wosauka wa fumbi lokhalokha (chifukwa cha kuvutika kwambiri)
“Komanso nakhala mmodzi mwa okhulupirira ndikumalangizana za kupirira, ndi kumalangizananso za chifundo
“Otero ndiwo (anthu abwino) a ku dzanja lamanja
“Koma amene sanakhulupirire Ayah Zathu, ndi anthu a kudzanja lamanzere (oipa)
“Moto wozungulira mbali zonse udzakhala pa iwo (ndikuwatsekera makomo)
“Ndikulumbilira dzuwa ndi dangalira lake
“Ndi mwezi pamene ukulitsatira (dzuwalo ndikulowa mmalo mwake powalitsa dziko dzuwalo litalowa)
“Ndi usana pamene ukulisonyeza poyera (kuti lisaphimbidwe)
“Ndi usiku pamene ukuliphimba
“Ndi thambo ndi (Mwini mphamvu zonse Wamkulu) Yemwe adalimanga ndi kulitukula (mwaluso)
“Ndi nthaka ndi (Mwini mphamvu zonse Wamkulu), Yemwe adaiyala (mbali zonse ndi kuichita kukhala ngati choyala)
“Ndi mzimu ndi Yemwe adawulinganiza (powupatsa mphamvu)
“Ndipo adaudziwitsa zoipa zake ndi zabwino zake; (ndi kuwupatsa ufulu ndi mphamvu zochitira zimene ukufuna)
“Ndithu wapambana amene wauyeretsa
“Ndipo ndithu wataika amene wauononga
“Thamud (Samudu) adakanira (Mneneri wawo) chifukwa cha kulumpha malire kwawo
“Pamene woipitsitsa wawo adadzipereka (kupha ngamira yozizwitsa)
“Pamenepo Mneneri wa Allah (Swaleh) adawauza: “Isiyeni ngamira ya Allah (idye mdziko la Allah). Musailetse kumwa madzi (pa tsiku lake).”
“Koma adamutsutsa ndikuipha; kwa chifukwa chimenecho Mbuye wawo (Allah) adawaononga chifukwa cha tchimo lawo; adangowafafaniza (onse mnthaka)
“Iye saopa zotsatira za chilangochi (chifukwa amenewa ndi malipiro a chilungamo pa zomwe adachita)
“Ndikulumbilira usiku pamene ukuphimba (chilichonse)
“Ndi usana pamene kukuyera
“Ndiponso Yemwe adalenga chachimuna ndi chachikazi
“Ndithu zochita zanu nzosiyanasiyana
“Tsono yemwe akupereka (pa njira ya Allah) ndikumamuopa (Mbuye wake ndikupewa zoletsedwa)
“Ndikumavomereza zinthu zabwino; (komwe kuli kukhulupirira Allah mwanzeru)
“Choncho timufewetsera njira yompititsa ku zabwino
“Koma uyo achite umbombo ndikuganiza za kuti iye payekha ngokwana
“Ndi kumatsutsa zinthu zabwino
“Choncho timufewetsera njira yompititsa ku mavuto (a muyaya)
“Ndipo chuma chake sichidzamthandiza (chilichonse) akadzagwera ku Moto
“Ndithu Ife ndi amene timawalongosolera anthu njira yabwino ndi njira yoipa
“Ndipo ndithu moyo womaliza ndi moyo woyamba uli m’manja mwathu
“Basi, ndikukuchenjezani za Moto woyaka mwa mphamvu
“Sakaulowa koma (kafiri) woipitsitsa kwambiri
“Yemwe amatsutsa (choona) ndi kunyoza (zisonyezo za Allah)
“Koma yemwe akuopa Allah kwambiri akatalikitsidwa ndi Moto
“Amene akupereka chuma chake ndi cholinga chodziyeretsa
“Ndipo palibe aliyense kwa iye, amene adamchitira za chifundo zomwe zikulipidwa
“Koma (akuchita zimenezi) kufuna chikondi cha Mbuye wake Wapamwambamwamba
“Ndipo posachedwa adzasangalala
“Ndikulumbilira mmawa dzuwa litakwera (imene ili nthawi yantchito)
“Ndi usiku pamene ukuvindikira
“Sadakusiye Mbuye wako (iwe Mneneri) (s.a.w) ndiponso sadakude
“Ndithu moyo watsiku lirimkudza ndi wabwino kwa iwe kuposa umoyo woyambawu
“Ndithu posachedwapa akupatsa Mbuye wako (zabwino zamdziko lapansi ndi tsiku lachimaliziro) ndipo ukondwera
“Kodi sadakupeze uli wa masiye ndipo adakupatsa pokhala pabwino
“Ndipo adakupeza uli wosazindikira (Qur’an) nakuongola (pokuzindikiritsa Qur’aniyo ndi malamulo a chipembedzo)
“Ndiponso adakupeza uli wosauka nakulemeretsa
“Basi, wamasiye usamchitire nkhanza
“Ndiponso wopempha usamukalipire
“Tsono mtendere wa Mbuye wako uwutchule (pothokoza ndi kugwira ntchito zabwino)
